sections.title: Agreement to Terms
sections.content: By accessing and using Attraction Storyboard, you accept and agree to be bound by the terms and provision of this agreement. If you do not agree to abide by the above, please do not use this service.

sections.title: Use License
sections.intro: Permission is granted to temporarily download one copy of the materials (information or software) on Attraction Storyboard for personal, non-commercial transitory viewing only. This is the grant of a license, not a transfer of title, and under this license you may not:
items: Use the materials for any commercial purpose or for any public display
Attempt to decompile or reverse engineer any software
Remove any copyright or other proprietary notations from the materials
Transfer the materials to another person or "mirror" the materials on any other server
Harass, abuse, or threaten other users or Attraction Storyboard staff

sections.title: Disclaimer
sections.content: The materials on Attraction Storyboard are provided on an 'as is' basis. Attraction Storyboard makes no warranties, expressed or implied, and hereby disclaims and negates all other warranties including, without limitation, implied warranties or conditions of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, or non-infringement of intellectual property or other violation of rights.

sections.title: Accuracy of Materials
sections.content: The materials appearing on Attraction Storyboard could include technical, typographical, or photographic errors. Attraction Storyboard does not warrant that any of the materials on Attraction Storyboard are accurate, complete, or current. Attraction Storyboard may make changes to the materials contained on its website at any time without notice.

sections.title: Copyright & Content Rights
sections.content: The materials on Attraction Storyboard are copyrighted. User-submitted content (reviews, tips, recommendations) remains the property of the user but grants Attraction Storyboard a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, modify, and distribute such content on Attraction Storyboard.

sections.title: Links
sections.content: Attraction Storyboard has not reviewed all of the sites linked to its website and is not responsible for the contents of any such linked site. The inclusion of any link does not imply endorsement by Attraction Storyboard of the site. Use of any such linked website is at the user's own risk.

sections.title: Modifications
sections.content: Attraction Storyboard may revise these terms of service for Attraction Storyboard at any time without notice. By using this website, you are agreeing to be bound by the then current version of these terms of service.

sections.title: Governing Law
sections.content: These terms and conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the United States, and you irrevocably submit to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts located in the United States.

sections.title: User Conduct
sections.intro: You agree not to engage in any of the following activities while using Attraction Storyboard:
items: Posting false, misleading, or defamatory content
Engaging in harassment or abusive behavior toward other users
Attempting to gain unauthorized access to our systems
Engaging in spamming or commercial activities
Violating any applicable laws or regulations
Infringing on the intellectual property rights of others

sections.title: Termination of Service
sections.content: Attraction Storyboard reserves the right to suspend or terminate your access to Attraction Storyboard at any time, for any reason, without notice. This includes but is not limited to violations of these Terms of Service.
